data.title: All integrated vaporizers and vape cartridges manufactured by K.U.S.H. Collective
data.excerpt: DCC is revoking the licenses of K.U.S.H. (Kinder Understanding Sensitive Healing) Collective and issuing this notice of embargo for all products manufactured by the licensee.
